verbose_text: We have previously reported that disabling NMD (NAM7, NMD2, and UPF3) or DDR genes such as EXO1, encoding a nuclease, or RAD24, encoding the checkpoint sliding clamp loader, suppresses temperature sensitivity of telomere defective cdc13-1 strains to similar extents.
